towns.name: Johnny Kim
towns.bio:
Johnny has been part of the Salmon River Adventure Team for 12 years.
        He is a co-founder of the company and one of it's most experienced guides.
        Johnny has won several White Water Contests

towns.name: Lenny Stone
towns.bio:
Lenny fell inlove with the waters at a young age. She wanted to be a marine
        Biologist growing up and would often visit the Salmon Rivers as a teenager. She
        Fell inlove with rating, and has been working for Salmon Rivers for 7 years

towns.name: Tim Parker
towns.bio:
Tim was a former Computer Programmer who turned River guide 5 Years
        ago. The youngest, but one of the best guides we have.
